# Beaver Creek Institution Perimeter Lights Replacement

## Tender Information
### Title
- English: Beaver Creek Institution Perimeter Lights Replacement
- French: Remplacement des lumières du périmètre de l'établissement Beaver Creek

### Reference and Solicitation Numbers

- Solicitation Number: WS3712987383

### Status
- Tender Status: Expired
- Status Description: This tender is no longer available for submission.

## Procurement Information

- Tender Closing Date: December 14, 2022 by 14:00 EST

- Expected Contract Start Date: December 5, 2022

- Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
